sub_title: ICT Healthcare Young Professional at Strict | MSc. Public Management and Leadership
summary:
'My dream is to make use the power of digitalisation and create more opportunities to make life easier for who need it'.

My name is Emilie and I'm currently in the ICT Healthcare Young Professional Traineeship at Strict. My focus is implementing digital innovations in, amongst other things, the healthcare sector. Due to the fact that I was able to witness the improvement on a persons quality of life thanks to technological advances, I am extremely motivated to help build a better life for those care recipients that need it. 

In a team, I am the one who is able to bring together people and ideas. Besides, I love to create and maintain an overview of everything that is going on in the project. Others describe me as an enthusiast with a positive mindset, who is not afraid to set ambitious goals for herself. With the life motto 'Can't do won't do' in the back of my mind, I am eager to work towards reaching goals together with a dedicated team. 

📧 : e.de.raadt@strict.nl 📞 : +31 6 26096315

Knowledge areas: Data-Driven Policy Making, Digitalizing Public Services, Digital Consultancy, Organizational Change Management, Transformational Leadership & Transactional Leadership, Collaborative Governance, Professional Scrum Master, Business Intelligence, Data Analytics

education.field_of_study: Public Administration: Public Management and Leadership
Political Science: International Relations and Organisations

profile_positions.description: The General Practice ICT scan is a new project within HuisartsenEemland, in which an advisory report will be drafted based on the current ICT situation within the general practices. As projectmanager of this starting project, my responsibilities lie within the creation of projectdocumentation and starting the stakeholdermanagement in this project. Additionally, I fulfill executive tasks such as creating the list of questions and the roll out of general practice vists that lead to the advisory report. Next to the General Practice ICT Scan, I am also projectmanager of the revision of the ICT Strategy of HuisartsenEemland. Using a projectbased approach, the stakeholders will be interviewed and required information collected, to eventually be able to write a new ICT strategy.
profile_positions.title: HuisartsenEemland - Projectmanager General Practice ICT Scan & ICT Strategy

profile_positions.description: The Regional M365 project serves as a way to stimulate regional collaboration and cohesion within the Eemland region. As projectmember, my responsibilities lie within the onboarding of new General Practices to the Regional M365 platform of Huisartsen Eemland. During the migration to the Regional M365, I guide the General Practices in all required steps, such as the transfer of IT supplier. Additionally, in my role as projectmember I am also responsible for the adoption of the Regional M365 platform and I organise trainingsessions for General Practices.
profile_positions.title: HuisartsenEemland - Projectmember Regional M365

profile_positions.description: In a very short period of time I created personas aimed at telephony and health domotics for VIGO. VIGO is a merger organization, consisting of multiple mental healthcare institutions. Using semi-structured interviews with various healthcare professionals, I created simplistic personas that reflected a very complex situation. The personas consists of a visualization of the current situation and serve as a means to create a roadmap for future implementations of telephony solutions and health demotics.
profile_positions.title: VIGO - Personas telefophony and healthdomotics

profile_positions.description: As projectmanager I was responsible for onboarding new KPMG Member Firms to the SAP IBS+ applications. My responsibilities lie within planning and managing the onboarding process, where I connected the multiple workflows in a structured manner.
profile_positions.title: KPMG International - Project Management Global Technology and Knowledge

profile_positions.description: Within the Global Clients and Markets department, I was project manager for two projects: One Pipeline and Performance Management. The aim of One Pipeline was to launch an application that would enable global data sharing within KPMG International. During this project, I was responsible for creating the Target Operating Model and the onboarding of new Member Firms to the application. After this project, I worked as a project manager with Performance Management. Amongst other things, I made sure that the different workflows within the projects were organized and structured and provided project reporting.
profile_positions.title: Titel KPMG International - Project Manager Global Clients and Markets

profile_positions.description: Alongside my regular tasks as an intern, such as monitoring relevant Public Affairs, I conducted research to the role of citizen lobbyists in the Dutch child benefit scandal. By means of conducting semi-structural interviews I was able to make a reconstruction of the factors that help explain the late acknowledgement of victims of this scandal. In addition, I have spoken with political representatives, creating a holistic view on the entire unfolding of the scandal.
profile_positions.title: Intern

profile_positions.description: I was a research-assistent working for Dr. Bakker and Dr. van Willigen in their research towards leadership during the COVID-19 crisis. My responsibilities were mostly concerned with collecting and reviewing data.
profile_positions.title: Student/research-assistent

profile_positions.description: I was a project assistant on the organisation of the World Circular Economy Forum (WCEF). Additionally, I have worked on multiple projects at the Ministry's International Department, focussed around international Circular Economy, European decision making and the coordination for multiple activities in the United States.
profile_positions.title: Intern

profile_positions.description: As a board member I oversaw the overall coordination of activities of the Study Association for Political Science in Leiden (SPIL). Together with my other seven board members, I help realise a complete restructuring of the association. Additionally, I was Commissioner of Foreign Affairs and was president over the foreign affairs committee. This committee has organised politically relevant study trips to Brussels, Prague and Seoul.
profile_positions.title: Board member and Commissioner of Foreign Afairs

profile_positions.description: As a member of the foreign affairs committee I supported the organisation of study related trips to Brussels, Berlin and Wasthington D.C.
profile_positions.title: Member of the Foreign Affairs Commitee

profile_positions.description: As a member of the Acquisition Committee I supported the acquiring of acquisition for the Study Association for Political Science in Leiden.
profile_positions.title: Member of the Acquisition Committee

volunteer_experiences.description: As a member of the Crew- and Acitivities Committee (CreAcie) I was responsible for all logistics surrounding the activities hosted and overall committee related activities.

During the EL CID week of 2017, I fulfilled multiple tasks as a volunteer. In the EL CID week of 2018, I was a hostess working at the information helpdesk, where I helped students with a wide variety of questions and supported the Coordination Team.
